definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: All formats of files and documents should be consented by the customers and the third part before they are used.
sentences.chinese: 所有文件图纸的格式应按用户和第三方同意后使用。

sentences.english: NO deliver rights, must through the third party to do trade and import or export.
sentences.chinese: 没有总销权，必须通过第三方来干贸易和进出口。

sentences.english: What are the 3rd party hosted service for form processing to avoid PCI complaince?
sentences.chinese: 什么是第三方托管格式处理以避免PCI投诉服务？

sentences.english: Do not violate third-party intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 请勿侵害包括版权，商标在内的第三方知识产权。

sentences.english: The third party company possibly propagandizes their product or the service in the morning paper website.
sentences.chinese: 第三方公司可能在早报网站宣传他们的产品或服务。

sentences.english: Are you inadvertently sharing confidential data with third parties?
sentences.chinese: 是否会不小心与第三方共享机密数据？

sentences.english: A customer can set up a prestaged transaction that authorizes access to cash to a third party.
sentences.chinese: 客户可以设置一个预设置交易，授权第三方提取现金。

sentences.english: Any third-party vendor so used has agreed to protect the confidentiality of information provided by VCES.
sentences.chinese: 任何第三方卖主习以为常答应保密资料器件。

sentences.english: Luckily a team of third-party experts will help make sure the house is as good as the buyer says.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是第三方团队专家会帮助确认房子的完好无损。

sentences.english: PhotoNews163 is a non-official client application of the 163. com photo news.
sentences.chinese: 视澜163是一款第三方提供的网易图片新闻终端。

sentences.english: The cure for triangulation is trust and intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 互相信任与亲密无间是根治第三方卷入的良方。

sentences.english: It is an important representative of Chinese journal in the world's third-party media data.
sentences.chinese: 在世界第三方媒体数据中是中国期刊的重要代表。

sentences.english: We set up a mechanism to inspect and establish accountability for the implementation of major government policies and introduced third-party evaluations.
sentences.chinese: 建立重大政策落实督查问责机制，开展第三方评估。

sentences.english: It cannot defend against vulnerabilities in third-party scripts or servers.
sentences.chinese: 它不能抵御第三方脚本或服务器中的安全漏洞。

sentences.english: Dipa Ma's abbilities in this regard were once tested by a third party.
sentences.chinese: 蒂帕嬷的这方面的神通曾由第三方测试过。

sentences.english: You should receive account statements from a third-party custodian.
sentences.chinese: 你应该会收到来自第三方托管人的帐户报表。
